posts.post_content:
Hello,

I'm selling a group of 33 Ramlys - would like to sell the entire lot at once if possible.  I can provide pictures from my iPhone if you need individual card pictures.

Below are the names and rough grades:
Coakley Gd
Ruelbach Fair (coffee stain on lower left corner)
Jones Gd
Devlin Vg/Ex
Thomas Gd
Elberfield Poor (little chunk missing from left side)
Ewing Fair
Anderson Fair/Gd
Huggins HOF Gd/Vg great image very minor wear
Hemphill Gd/Vg but some slight surface dings
Nichols Gd/Vg but some slight surface dings
Ferriss Vg but two pinholes
Shekard Vg
Hoblitzell Gd/Vg
Howell Pr/Fair lots of wear
O'Leary EX
Kargar Fair
Konetchey Poor
Street Poor
Unclane Gd/Vg +
Criger Gd/Vg +
Lumley Vg/Ex
Mclean Fair light abrasion to right side
Wagner Gd
Lord Gd
Alperman Fair
Stephens Gd-
Milan Gd-
Bransfield Poor
Hummell Gd
Conroy Fair/Gd
Reilly Vg-
Donlin possible trimming Poor

The highlights of the group are O'Leary and Huggins - the rest are mainly lower grade cards but most have great images.  I am asking $2975 for the lot, or will entertain similar offers.  Please PM me for more information.

Thanks,
Matt

If the person who bought this lot would like to sell me the Bransfield please PM me.

Thanks

Darn,
Andrew beat me to that request...if Andrew does not buy it, I might be interested in the Bransfield as well.

Joshua
